mapper.sql: university.id as id , university.code as code , university.name as name , university.subjection as subjection , university.educationLevel as educationLevel , university.property as property , university.type as type , university.url as url , university.address as address , university.contactPhone as contactPhone , university.entranceIntro as entranceIntro , university.universityIntro as universityIntro , university.provinceId as provinceId , university.provinceName as provinceName , university.cityId as cityId , university.cityName as cityName , university.countyId as countyId , university.countyName as countyName , university.batchType as batchType, province.name as province , dict.name AS dictName, sort.sort as sort, sort.majoredCount as majoredCount, sort.images as images, dict1.name as eduLevelName
mapper.select:
SELECT
from gk_university university LEFT JOIN gk_province province ON province.name = university.provinceName LEFT JOIN gk_university_dict dict ON university.property=dict.dictId and dict.type='FEATURE' LEFT JOIN gk_university_sort sort ON sort.universityId=university.id LEFT OUTER JOIN gk_university_dict dict1 ON university.educationLevel=dict1.dictId and dict1.type='EDULEVEL' AND id=#{id}
